name: Chimchar
description: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its fire-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.effect: Moves flagged as being punch-based have 1.2× their base power for this Pokémon.  sucker punch is not flagged as punch-based; its original, Japanese name only means "surprise attack".
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.
